import profileImagePath from "../images/profile__image.jpg"; import profileImageAfterPath from "../images/profile__image_after.svg"; import React from "react"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm"; function Main() { let popupWithForm = null; const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setIsEditProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); if(isEditProfilePopupOpen){ popupWithForm = ( ); } return (
{popupWithForm}
{ setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true); }} >
